titles.title: To repeal certain sections of the Act of May 26, 1936, pertaining to the Virgin Islands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Mrs. Christensen moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 57.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Bingaman without amendment. With written report No. 110-19.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 44.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 6/29/2007--Public Law. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Repeals specified provisions pertaining to real property taxation in the U.S. Virgin Islands. Deems such amendment to have taken effect on July 22, 1954.
